about_the_game:
VIRTUAL GIRL - SEX SIMULATOR

Are you ready to immerse yourself in a world of Virtual Reality and unparalleled realism? Introducing the ultimate romance simulation, where every choice is yours. With stunning realistic HDRP graphics powered by Unity, this game offers a captivating journey into a world where passion meets customization.

MOUSE/KEYBOARD AND VR SUPPORT

Play your way, knowing the experience remains just as captivating, whether you're exploring in VR or on your PC screen.

HIGHLY DETAILED CHARACTER MODELS

You have Amanda, a stunning girl available in the game, and with the DLC available, you can unlock 10 more uniquely captivating women, each with their own distinct personalities and charm.  Also, you can enjoy four free scenarios, where you can choose any background color you want, a wine room, a red room and a pink room with a pole dance stage. With DLC you can explore 5 extra breathtaking scenarios, from the sultry vibes of the poker room to the sophistication of the bar room. Whether on your PC or in Virtual Reality, every detail has been meticulously designed to make your experience as realistic and engaging as possible.

DLC CONTENT

We’ve added DLCs to the game to keep the initial price affordable for all fans of our games, giving you the option to purchase only the characters you’re most interested in. If you’d like to enjoy the full experience, check out our discounted bundles available right here in the store!

With over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions - all included, no DLC -, you can tailor every moment to your desire. This isn’t just a game, it's a fully interactive simulation that redefines romance in Virtual Reality. Don’t just play, feel, connect, and experience romance like never before.

WHAT IS INCLUDED IN MAIN GAME

  • Stunning Game Engine
    Experience incredible graphics designed for both PC and VR platforms.

  • Amanda – The Star of the Game
    Meet Amanda, our captivating main character.

  • Josh – The Male Counterpart
    Interact with Josh, a male character designed to complement Amanda. (with genitals)

  • Customizable Scenario, Wine Room, Red Room and Pink Room
    Choose your preferred background to interact with Amanda and Josh.

  • Over 200 Animations
    Enjoy a wide variety of movements and facial expressions that bring characters to life.

  • Exceptional Realism
    Intimate details of both Amanda and Josh deliver unparalleled realism.

  • Realistic Graphics

    HDRP visuals that bring every scene and character to life.

  • Immersive Virtual Reality Support

    Dive into the romance with VR devices or enjoy the full experience with a mouse and keyboard.

  • Massive Customization

    Over 200 body animations and 100 facial expressions for endless possibilities.

  • No Story Limits

    Create your own narrative, choose the woman, the scene, and the mood.

Expandable Features with DLC

10 Unique Women: Each with distinct personalities and styles to captivate your imagination.

5 Stunning Scenarios: bar room, dressing room, poker room, and more.

Take your gaming experience to the next level. Embrace the power of Virtual Reality and embark on the ultimate romance simulation. The choice is yours—are you ready to feel the connection?

Download now and let the journey begin!
